project_name.justification: The text consistently refers to the project as the 'New York Canyon Property'. For example: 'Emergent Metals Corp. ... announces that it has expanded its New York Canyon Property (“New York Canyon” or the “Property” in Nevada...'

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified in the first sentence of both articles: 'Vancouver, British Columbia – TheNewswire - January 29, 2024 -- Emergent Metals Corp. ("Emergent" or the “Company”) (TSXV:EMR) announces that it has expanded its New York Canyon Property...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the buyer, Emergent Metals Corp., is identified at the end of the press releases: 'On behalf of the Board of Directors David G. Watkinson, P.Eng. President & CEO'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The transactions involve the acquisition of mining claims to expand an existing property, not the acquisition of a percentage interest in the project. The text states Emergent 'expanded its New York Canyon Property ... by acquiring 634 unpatented lode claims' and 'further expanded its New York Canyon Property ... by acquiring 6 unpatented lode claims'.

primary_commodity.justification: The text states that the property hosts copper targets: 'New York Canyon hosts copper skarn and porphyry exploration targets including Longshot Ridge, Copper Queen, Champion, and Emma.'

verified_article_link.justification: No article link was provided in the source documents.

currency.justification: The currency is specified in the terms of the second acquisition: 'Emergent has acquired the claims for US$66,000...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: This value is from the acquisition of the Yorkie Claims from Western Geoscience Inc. The text states: 'Emergent has acquired the claims for US$66,000 ($US$12,000 paid to WGI with six additional monthly payments of US$9,000...)'.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any payment in shares.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The cash payment is explicitly stated, so this combined field is not applicable.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any issuance of shares.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any payment in warrants.

option_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any payment in options.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: There is no mention of a drilling commitment in meters as part of the transaction terms.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text mentions historical exploration spending by a previous partner ('KEX after spending over US$6.7 million in exploration on the Property'), but there is no mention of a new exploration spending commitment by Emergent as part of these transactions.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: As part of the acquisition of the Yorkie Claims, Emergent granted a 2% NSR to the seller. The text states: 'In addition, Emergent will grant WGI a 2% Net Smelter Royalty (“NSR”) on the claims capped at US$1,750,000.' A separate 1% NSR was also granted to another party on a different set of claims.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states the total area of the property after the acquisitions: 'The Property now consists of 21 patented claims and 792 unpatented mining claims totaling about 16,000 acres (6,500 hectares).'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit is provided alongside the area measurement: '...totaling about 16,000 acres (6,500 hectares).'

resource_size.justification: The text describes the New York Canyon property as having 'exploration targets' and does not provide a mineral resource estimate for it. A resource is mentioned, but for a different property owned by the company: 'Emergent’s Golden Arrow Property is an advanced stage property with a well-defined measured and indicated gold and silver resource.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are provided in the first sentence of the articles: 'Emergent Metals Corp. ("Emergent" or the “Company”) (TSXV:EMR)'.
